page.title: 02Games children play in Hayle
page.content: Here are some popular games we play in the playground and at home. { "Sticky Glue"}is a game of touch.When we're caught we stand still and someone has to crawl under our legs. { "British Bulldog"}is also a touch game where players run from base to base dodging the catchers. You play{"Conkers"}with horse chestnuts.You have to destroy your opponent's conker by striking it. {"Dodgeball"}is when the players stand and attempt to avoid the ball hitting their legs. {"Lego"}is a construction kit of plastic pieces which you can fit together to make lots of things. {"Monopoly"}is a board game where you sell and buy property. { "Snap"}is a game when you try to match cards and when they match, one person shouts, "Snap" to win.
